name: Copy 2 Compare
description: Copy two Dirs/Files names from anywhere such as `nautilus` or `gnome-terminal`, and then compare them.  Dirs/Files copied to the `CLIPBOARD` can only be used for comparison. Dirs/Files selected to the `PRIMARY` with mouse can be opened by click the menu item. Only one file or directory can be copied each time. Meld must be installed. The hotkey `ctrl-o` can open the last file selected by the mouse.
